plots.content:
Using one A3 plot, we make a stop motion strips of 8 frames, and animate back into a video. This is the "plot loop" technique. This is a continuation of the heads of plots/478 with a better implementation of a noise loop: rotating various layers of perlin noises. This piece was made for #OBJKT4OBJKT celebration.

Inks: Robert Oster Rubine and Fire & Ice.

(seed 15)
